Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a fun tactical shooter. It is mostly played in a competitive settings. The game has a few flaws in its current state, and being a free to play player will match you up with shady people like cheaters, toxic people, etc. The game also has weapon skins that can style your weapons. These are only visual, and do not affect the weapon stats in any way. If you want to play this game, make sure to put your hours in it.
